cakes.name: Sheet Cake
cakes.about: Sheet cake, also know as slab cake, are one-layer cakes that have been decorated with beautifully piped buttercream. They are available in a range of simple and elegant styles, colours and can be customized to any theme.

cakes.name: Bundt Cake
cakes.about: Bundt cakes are prefect for any occasion; holiday gift, birthday gift, anniversary gift, celebratory gift or a just-because gift. A 10 inch cake, with numerous flavor options, that can be topped with sugar glaze, dusted with powdered sugar, drizzled with chocolate ganache or be served plain.

cakes.name: Number/Letter Cake
cakes.about: Number/Letter cakes are the perfect way to celebrate those big milestone birthdays or to honor a big-day detail such as anniversaries or weddings. As with our round cakes, our number/letter cakes are also created with bespoke colour schemes and themes in mind, and are always personalised with a name and decorations.

cupcakes.name: Elegant
cupcakes.about: 1-2 colors of  your choice with decorative items (such as sprinkles, 4 marshmallow fondant toppers and edible luster dust.

cupcakes.name: Luxury
cupcakes.about: 1-4 colors of your choice with decorative items (such as fresh edible flowers, 4 acrylic toppers, edible gold leaf, luxury sprinkle blend and edible luster dust.

cupcakes.name: Floral
cupcakes.about: Will feature a range of flowers 3 floral designs with multiple colors.

cookies.name: Drop Cookies
cookies.about: 1-2 colors of  your choice with decorative items such as sprinkles, 4 marshmallow fondant toppers and edible luster dust.

cookies.name: Sugar Cookies
cookies.about: A dozen sugar cookies covered with homemade marshmallow fondant. They make a beautiful personalized edible gift or sweet treat at any party or to enjoy with a cup of tea. No detail goes unnoticed with your bespoke set of sugar cookies.

cookies.name: New York-Style Cookies
cookies.about: A dozen 4 ounce cookies of heavenly goodness; crispy on the outside, soft and chewy on the inside.

brownies.name: Brownie
brownies.about: Half dozen chocolate and cocoa powder brownies made with premium quality ingredients.

brownies.name: Blondies
brownies.about: Half dozen chocolate blondies made with premium quality chocolate all-natural ingredients.
